definition: to sell/marketing
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense

sentences.english: Products to local market and exported to international markets.
sentences.chinese: 產品行銷全國各地，並出口國際市場。

sentences.english: In view of the development prospects of the Chinese market at present, he does some market research.
sentences.chinese: 鑑於目前中國市場的發展前景，他做了一個行銷企劃。

sentences.english: Industry and trade with foreign countries became prosperous, woolen cloth was on sale in European countries.
sentences.chinese: 城市手工業和對外貿易都相當繁盛，呢絨行銷歐洲。

sentences.english: House purchasing and real estate company's marketing strategical research.
sentences.chinese: 購屋行爲與建設公司行銷策略之研究。

sentences.english: It becomes much more of a peer-based marketing and image.
sentences.chinese: 資訊科技一個以同儕爲基礎的行銷和圖像變得更加多。

sentences.english: So I'm being transferred to telemarketing.
sentences.chinese: 那我要被調到電話行銷部了。

sentences.english: This is from Advertisements for Myself.
sentences.chinese: 出自他的《自我行銷》一書。

sentences.english: We need to review our marketing strategy.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要回顧一下我們的行銷策略。

sentences.english: Our clients include every main corporations or groups and major marketing connections and so on.
sentences.chinese: 客戶羣涵蓋全球大型企業或機關團體及重大行銷網等。

sentences.english: Ding Jiabao clay product marketing more than 20 overseas countries and regions.
sentences.chinese: 丁家堡的泥塑產品行銷海外二十多個國家和地區。

sentences.english: Many marketing executives sell Melaleuca products part- time.
sentences.chinese: 許多行銷主管是兼職做美樂家的。

sentences.english: The group plans to market and license the Polaroid brand name globally.
sentences.chinese: 這個集團計畫要全球行銷以及授權寶麗萊的品牌名。

sentences.english: It's going to take a long time to solve this marketing problem.
sentences.chinese: 要解決這個行銷問題，得花上好一段時間纔行。

sentences.english: Good morning. I am Jackson Lee, Marketing Manager of XYZ Company.
sentences.chinese: 早安，我是XYZ公司的行銷經理李傑生。

sentences.english: Obert: We'd need your full technical and marketing support.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要貴公司在技術和行銷方面的全力支持。

sentences.english: Catch the present condition how the marketing strategy is conducted among those artist villages.
sentences.chinese: 瞭解臺灣藝術村實施行銷策略之現況。
